status.description: This issue has been validated/reproduced, but has not been prioritized yet.
status.name: Confirmed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

About 30 minutes after verifying EUCA-11886 by using a Cloudformation stack (template attached):
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-create-stack NginxStack --template-file cfn-elb-accesslog-cloudwatch-vpc-template.json --parameter KeyName=eng-admin --parameter ImageId=emi-6b3768f5 --region eng-admin@future
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@future
STACK	NginxStack	CREATE_COMPLETE		CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack with ELB access logging in Eucalyptus VPC	2017-01-25T04:29:49.394Z
PARAMETER	ImageId		emi-6b3768f5
PARAMETER	KeyName		eng-admin
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.medium
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	AccessLogBucket	nginxstack-s3loggingbucket-jhujqdukr4g8c
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://NginxStac-NginxELB-I4Y2AKFSKUZ84-001458033822.lb.c-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stack-resources -n NginxStack --region eng-admin@future
RESOURCE	InboundResponsePortsNetworkAclEntry	NginxStack-InboundResponsePortsNetworkAclEntry-2Q3LTUJ8YKKHO	AWS::EC2::NetworkAclEntry		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	SubnetNetworkAclAssociation	aclassoc-d13b21f9	AWS::EC2::SubnetNetworkAclAssociation		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	ScaleUpPolicy	arn:aws:autoscaling::001458033822:scalingPolicy:b5d61d06-4406-439a-af3c-1b969e33effa:autoScalingGroupName/NginxStack-AutoScalingGroup-SOYHVCMJIRWPF:policyName/NginxStack-ScaleUpPolicy-Z3VHDXZBHP6ZC	AWS::AutoScaling::ScalingPolicy		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	OutBoundNetworkAclEntry	NginxStack-OutBoundNetworkAclEntry-0EPM7J3XIQ8QR	AWS::EC2::NetworkAclEntry		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	NginxSubnet	subnet-97a5f92c	AWS::EC2::Subnet		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	NginxNetworkAcl	acl-fc95912f	AWS::EC2::NetworkAcl		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	NginxVPC	vpc-d60a7057	AWS::EC2::VPC		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	NginxInternetGateway	igw-79107daa	AWS::EC2::InternetGateway		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	NginxAttachGateway	NginxStack-NginxAttachGateway-VCLWFKHBZP6K2	AWS::EC2::VPCGatewayAttachment		CREATE_COMPLETE

RESOURCE	NginxSubnetRouteTableAssocaiation	rtbassoc-20e0e876	AWS::EC2::SubnetRouteTableAssociation		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	NginxRoute	NginxStack-NginxRoute-WHR6JIBQ6KMLP	AWS::EC2::Route		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	InboundSSHNetworkAclEntry	NginxStack-InboundSSHNetworkAclEntry-CPHKUZJHTBIY3	AWS::EC2::NetworkAclEntry		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	InboundHTTPNetworkAclEntry	NginxStack-InboundHTTPNetworkAclEntry-MJE3M2IL71CNS	AWS::EC2::NetworkAclEntry		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	NginxELB	NginxStac-NginxELB-I4Y2AKFSKUZ84	AWS::ElasticLoadBalancing::LoadBalancer		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	S3LoggingBucket	nginxstack-s3loggingbucket-jhujqdukr4g8c	AWS::S3::Bucket		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	LoadBalancerSecurityGroup	sg-aeb042d9	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	InstanceSecurityGroup	sg-28641818	AWS::EC2::SecurityGroup		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	LaunchConfig	NginxStack-LaunchConfig-L5S5CL6RTZGJW	AWS::AutoScaling::LaunchConfiguration		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	AutoScalingGroup	NginxStack-AutoScalingGroup-SOYHVCMJIRWPF	AWS::AutoScaling::AutoScalingGroup		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	ScaleDownPolicy	arn:aws:autoscaling::001458033822:scalingPolicy:6b983deb-bd3a-47d5-858f-6a1c2efb403f:autoScalingGroupName/NginxStack-AutoScalingGroup-SOYHVCMJIRWPF:policyName/NginxStack-ScaleDownPolicy-JG476VCW7S3CW	AWS::AutoScaling::ScalingPolicy		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	CPUAlarmHigh	NginxStack-CPUAlarmHigh-0WMUFNGSRQ3RM	AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm		CREATE_COMPLETE
RESOURCE	CPUAlarmLow	NginxStack-CPUAlarmLow-UXKFMXJU1COR9	AWS::CloudWatch::Alarm		CREATE_COMPLETE
{code}
Any API requests to the UFS fails:
{code}
[root@c-25 ~]# euserv-describe-services
euserv-describe-services: error: connection error (HTTPConnectionPool(host='bootstrap.c-29.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com', port=8773): Read timed out. (read timeout=30))

[root@d-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lb-policies --region eng-admin@future
eulb-describe-lb-policies: error: connection error (('Connection aborted.', gaierror(-2, 'Name or service not known')))
{code}

*Signs*

* systemctl status on UFS
{code}
[root@c-29 ~]# systemctl status eucalyptus-cloud.service -l

           └─13662 eucalyptus-cloud

fields.summary: UFS unresponsive; absent client reply warning in systemctl logs

comments.body:
To get the UFS operational, I had to restart the eucalyptus-service:
{code}
[root@c-29 ~]# systemctl restart eucalyptus-cloud.service
[root@c-29 ~]# systemctl status eucalyptus-cloud.service -l
● eucalyptus-cloud.service - Eucalyptus cloud web services
   Loaded: loaded (/usr/lib/systemd/system/eucalyptus-cloud.service; enabled; vendor preset: disabled)
   Active: active (running) since Wed 2017-01-25 01:06:36 PST; 2min 41s ago
 Main PID: 480 (eucalyptus-clou)
   CGroup: /system.slice/eucalyptus-cloud.service
           ├─480 eucalyptus-cloud
           └─483 eucalyptus-cloud

Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: _________________________________________________________
Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: Detected Interfaces
Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: _________________________________________________________
Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: em1.107 -- [/10.107.101.64/16 [/10.107.255.255]]
Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: em1.107 -- /10.107.101.64
Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: em1 -- [/10.111.1.64/16 [/10.111.255.255]]
Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: em1 -- /10.111.1.64
Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: lo -- [/127.0.0.1/8 [null]]
Jan 25 01:07:36 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: lo -- /127.0.0.1
Jan 25 01:07:40 c-29.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com eucalyptus-cloud[480]: 2017-01-25 01:07:40 WARN SHUTDOWN:eucalyptus-bootstrap-callbacks-basiccallbackprocessor Freeing duplicate thread pool...

[root@c-25 ~]# euserv-describe-services
SERVICE  autoscaling          API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.autoscaling     enabled
SERVICE  autoscalingbackend   eucalyptus       10.111.1.60                     enabled
SERVICE  bootstrap            bootstrap        10.111.1.60                     enabled
SERVICE  cloudformation       API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.cloudformation  enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatch           API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.cloudwatch      enabled
SERVICE  cloudwatchbackend    eucalyptus       10.111.1.60                     enabled
SERVICE  cluster              ds2              ds2-cc-0                        enabled
SERVICE  cluster              evol             evol-cc-0                       enabled
SERVICE  compute              API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.compute         enabled
SERVICE  dns                  API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.dns             enabled
SERVICE  euare                API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.euare           enabled
SERVICE  eucalyptus           eucalyptus       10.111.1.60                     enabled
SERVICE  identity             API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.identity        enabled
SERVICE  imaging              API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.imaging         enabled
SERVICE  imagingbackend       eucalyptus       10.111.1.60                     enabled
SERVICE  loadbalancing        API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.loadbalancing   enabled
SERVICE  notifications        eucalyptus       10.111.1.60                     enabled
SERVICE  objectstorage        API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.objectstorage   enabled
SERVICE  pollednotifications  eucalyptus       10.111.1.60                     enabled
SERVICE  reporting            bootstrap        10.111.1.60                     enabled
SERVICE  simpleworkflow       API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.simpleworkflow  enabled
SERVICE  storage              ds2              ds2-sc-0                        enabled
SERVICE  storage              evol             evol-sc-0                       enabled
SERVICE  tokens               API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64.tokens          enabled
SERVICE  user-api             API_10.111.1.64  API_10.111.1.64                 enabled
{code}

However there seems to be issues with federated account API requests:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# eulb-describe-lb-policies --region eng-admin@future
eulb-describe-lb-policies: error (403 Forbidden): java.nio.channels.UnresolvedAddressException
[root@d-02 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region eng-admin@future
euform-describe-stacks: error (403 Forbidden): java.nio.channels.UnresolvedAddressException
{code}

*Update*

Restarted the CLC and UFS on both clouds however this did not resolve the issue.  
UFS from {{drake}} region had the core dump message after the restart:
{code}
...
Jan 25 01:48:19 d-14 eucalyptus-cloud: #

So far, they have been running for 5 hours after the cloud property change, and I was able to deploy Cloudformation stacks on both clouds (which also contained ELBs in each deployment).  I will keep running through the verifications on this setup, and report back if anything changes.  Let me know if there are any questions.
